get.summary: Endpoint that can retrieve a list of all Notification Addresses for the given organization
Endpoint that can retrieve a list of all Notification Addresses for the given email address
Endpoint that can retrieve a list of all Notification Addresses for the given phone number

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number to retrieve notification addresses for

parameters.name: countrycode
parameters.description: The country code for the phone number (default: +47)

get.summary:
Endpoint that can retrieve a list of all user contact information for the given organization.
Returns the contact details that users have registered for acting on behalf of this organization.

parameters.name: organizationNumber
parameters.description: The organization number to retrieve contact information for

200.description: Successfully retrieved user contact information. Returns an array of contacts (may be empty if organization exists but has no user contact info).

403.description: Caller does not have the required Dashboard Maskinporten scope (altinn:profile.support.admin).

404.description: Organization number not found in the registry.

get.summary:
Endpoint that can retrieve a list of all user contact information for the given email address.
Returns the contact details that users have registered with the specified email address.

parameters.name: emailAddress
parameters.description: The email address to retrieve contact information for

200.description: Successfully retrieved user contact information. Returns an array of contacts for the specified email address (empty array if no contacts found)

403.description: Caller does not have the required Dashboard Maskinporten scope (altinn:profile.support.admin).

get.summary:
Endpoint that can retrieve a list of all user contact information for the given phone number.
Returns the contact details that users have registered with the specified phone number.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number to retrieve contact information for

parameters.name: countrycode
parameters.description: The country code for the phone number

200.description: Successfully retrieved user contact information. Returns an array of contacts for the specified phone number (empty array if no contacts found)

403.description: Caller does not have the required Dashboard Maskinporten scope (altinn:profile.support.admin).

get.summary: Get the favorite parties for the current user

put.summary: Add a party to the group of favorites for the current user

201.description: Returns status code 201 if the party is added to favorites

204.description: Returns status code 204 if the party is already in the favorites

delete.summary: Remove a party from the group of favorites for the current user

204.description: Returns status code 204 if the party was deleted from favorites

404.description: Returns status code 404 if the party was not found in favorites

get.summary: Get the notification addresses the current user has registered for a party

parameters.name: partyUuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the party for which the notification address is being set

put.summary: Add or update the notification addresses the current user has registered for a party

parameters.name: partyUuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the party for which the notification address is being set

requestBody.description: The request containing the notification address details

delete.summary: Delete the notification addresses the current user has registered for a party

parameters.name: partyUuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the party for which the notification address is being deleted

get.summary: Get the notification addresses the current user has registered for all parties
Endpoint looking up the notification addresses for the given organization

post.summary: Create a new notification address for an organization.

200.description: Returns the existing address if it is already registered. This means that duplicate create commands will only result in the creation one notification address.

201.description: Returns the newly created notification address

get.summary: Endpoint looking up a specific notification address for the given organization

put.summary: Update a notification address for an organization

200.description: Returns the updated address if it is already registered

409.description: Returns problem details with a reference to the conflicting address in the instance parameter

delete.summary: Delete a notification address for an organization

get.summary: Retrieve all groups for a user
Gets the user profile for a given user id
Gets the user profile for a given user uuid
Gets the current user based on the request context

post.summary: Gets the user profile for a given SSN

put.summary: Updates the profile settings of the current user based on the request context

patch.summary: Updates the profile settings of the current user based on the request context

nationalIdentityNumber.description: Gets or sets the national identity number (SSN/D-number) of the user.

name.description: Gets or sets the full name of the user.

email.description:
Gets or sets the email address registered by the user for this organization.
May be null if no email address is set.

phone.description:
Gets or sets the phone number registered by the user for this organization.
May be null if no phone number is set.

organizationNumber.description:
Gets or sets the organization number the user is acting on behalf of.
May be null if no organization number is set.

lastChanged.description:
Gets or sets the timestamp when this contact information was last changed.
This timestamp applies to both email and phone number as they are stored together.
Timestamps are stored and returned in UTC.

DashboardUserContactInformationResponse.description:
Response model for user contact information registered for an organization in the Support Dashboard.
Represents a user's personal contact details they have registered for acting on behalf of an organization.
This also includes the organization number the user is acting on behalf of.

groupId.description: The unique identifier of the group

isFavorite.description: A flag indicating whether the group is a group of favorite parties

parties.description: Array of party IDs that belong to this group

GroupResponse.description: GroupResponse is used to represent a group of parties

emailAddress.description: The email address. May be null if no email address is set.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number. May be null if no phone number is set.

resourceIncludeList.description: A list of resources that the user has registered to receive notifications for. The format is in URN. This is used to determine which resources the user can receive notifications for.

NotificationSettingsRequest.description: Request model for the professional notification address for an organization, also called personal notification address.

emailAddress.description: The email address. May be null if no email address is set.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number. May be null if no phone number is set.

resourceIncludeList.description: A list of resources that the user has registered to receive notifications for. The format is in URN. This is used to determine which resources the user can receive notifications for.

userId.description: The user id of logged-in user for whom the specific contact information belongs to.

needsConfirmation.description: An indication of whether the notification address needs confirmation from a user

NotificationSettingsResponse.description: Response model for the professional notification address for an organization, also called personal notification address.

notificationAddresses.description: Represents a list of mandatory notification address

OrganizationResponse.description: Represents a on organization with  notification addresses

language.description: The language the user has selected in Altinn portal.

doNotPromptForParty.description:
Indicates whether the user should not be prompted for party selection.
Can be set without using PreselectedPartyUuid.

showClientUnits.description: Indicates whether client units should be shown.

shouldShowSubEntities.description: Indicates whether sub-entities should be shown.

shouldShowDeletedEntities.description: Indicates whether deleted entities should be shown.

ProfileSettingsPatchRequest.description: Represents user-specific portal settings and preferences.
